Action.author: greg.haskins
Action.body: Agree with error checking. I think the defer is not strictly necessary though. IIUC, the .Close() only forces the rendering of the data to the buffer, which is only needed in the success path. The resources themselves (the buffer and the writers) will be garbage collected either way.
